lines.text: I'm gonna tell you something about women. I never met one that didn't need a rap in the head, and often.
Why'd you do it? Why did you kill him?
He had bad breath.

[to Reles, after he is arrested for murdering Eadie]
I'm gonna watch you fry! I'm gonna watch you fry! I'm gonna watch you fry!
Hey, Joe, c'mon in, we've been waitin' for you.
[Reles lets Joey Collins into the luxury apartment he has been using]
Eadie, I'd like to talk to you.
[to his wife sitting in the living room]
Hey, Joe, listen, Joe, I was just telling Eadie, that you know, you're both friends of mine and I like ya, what I'd like to do is I'd like for you and Eadie to have this apartment.
We don't want it.
What do you mean, you don't want it?
Well, just what I said.
Well, maybe, Eadie wants it.
Well, she doesn't.
You read minds?
Eadie?
[to his wife]

[becoming angry]
Listen, what is it with you two? What are you doing to me, I don't understand! Look, I offered you a free ticket to this place and it's like I was offering you poison or something! What, do you come from some other world than I do? Maybe they didn't teach you-
[Reles turns and throws and shatters a shot glass against the wall]

[shouting angrily]
Take, you see, what you can get your hands on, you take! Don't ask questions! Take! What you want, take! What I want, I take! Nothing means nothing unless I got it! What do you got hands for! Huh? TAKE!
